HotelElement.Name: Sathorn Grace Hotel and Serviced Residence

Address.Address1: SOI SATHORN 11, SATHORN TAI ROAD, TAWANA 81/1

Description.Text:
Sathorn Grace Serviced Residence is situated on Sathorn Road, running parallel with Silom Road, business district, It is near Embassies, Hospitals, Shopping centers and restaurants, not far from BTS station, with 62 units have a range of brand new studio and one to two bedroom apartments that is well complimented with Modern Style mixed with Contemporary Style facilities and spacious private apartments.
Each furnished apartment includes stylish fitting, a fully equipped kitchen, cable TV and an LCD TV. There are WiFi zones in common areas, computers in the Business Corner for business support and 24-hour reception for personalized assistance throughout your stay every apartment is designed to allow you to relax, live, work and entertain in comfort. Broadband Internet service is available in each room along with direct dial telephone and IDD service. Relax in the rooftop swimming pool, exercise in the fitness center and enjoy sauna.
You will experience friendly staff at Sathorn Grace Serviced Residence. The hotel will make you feel at home.

Queen Sirikit National Convention Center (QSNCC) - 5 Kilometer, Siam Society House and Garden - 4 Kilometers, Erawan Shrine - Four Face Buddha - 3 Kilometers, Jim Thompson's Museum - 6 Kilometers, Lumpini Stadium (Thai Boxing) - 2 Kilometers, Silom Road - 1 Kilometers, Thailand Culture Center - 8 Kilometers, Thai National Museum - 8 Kilometers, Chao Phaya River and Bangkok's Canals - 2 Kilometers, Temple of the Dawn (Wat Arun) - 6 Kilometers, Grand Palace and Temple of the Emerald Buddha - 8 Kilometers, Wat Po - Reclining Buddha - 8 Kilometers, Patpong - Night entertainments and Night market 1 Kilometer, Lumpinee park - Biggest green area in the city 2 Kilometers, St. Louise Hospital 0.8 Kilometer, Australian Embassy 1.5 kilometers, US Embassy 2.5 Kilometers, British Embassy 3 Kilometers and Japan Embassy 2 Kilometers.

ONE BED PREMIER 70-75 Sqm.- ROOM - One Bedroom Premier with 1 king bed. Furnished One Bedroom with living room, air conditioning, balcony, hairdryer, kitchenette, refrigerator, Laundry Machine, cable TV, separate shower and bathtub, wi-fi, and 32" LCD TV with DVD player. Non-smoking room (on request). Maximum occupied for 2 persons.
TWO BED ROOM SUITE 100-110 Sqm.- ROOM - Two Bedroom Suite with king bed. Full furnished Two Bedroom and living room, air conditioning, balcony, hairdryer, kitchenette, refrigerator, Laundry Machine ,cable TV, 2 separate shower room, Jacuzzi in master bedroom, wi-fi, and 32" LCD TV . Non-smoking room (on request). Maximum occupied for 4 persons.
STANDARD 30-35 Sqm.- ROOM - Studio Room Suite with one king bed includes Air conditioning , Balcony / Terrace, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Color TV, Hairdryer, Internet access(Charge), Iron / Ironing board, / Spa bath, Kettle, Small Kitchen, Laundry service, Microwave oven, Modem / data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Refrigerator, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone and Washing machine (Not In The Room-Charge).Maximum occupied for 2 persons
ONE BED EXECUTIVE 60-65 Sqm.- ROOM - One Bedroom Executive with one king bed includes Air conditioning , Balcony / Terrace, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Color TV, Hairdryer, Internet access(Charge), Iron / Ironing board, / Spa bath, Kettle, Small Kitchen, Laundry service, Microwave oven, Modem / data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Refrigerator, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone and Washing machine, Bathtub, wi-fi, and 32" LCD TV with DVD player. Non-smoking room (on request).Maximum occupied for 2 persons
